name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of Environment Variables to execute PowerShell
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*cmd.{0,5}(?:\/c|\/r)(?:\s|)\"set\s[a-zA-Z]{3,6}.*(?:\{\d\}){1,}\\\"\s+?\-f(?:.*\)){1,}.*\"/)`
